output_data.clarification_question: To accurately assign the appropriate CPT code (9083x for psychotherapy, or E/M with add-on) for this established patient visit, please specify the total face-to-face and non-face-to-face time dedicated to the encounter, including both medication management and therapeutic counseling.
output_data.suggested_answer: 53 minutes (If the session met or exceeded 53 minutes, 90837 would be the most appropriate primary code.)

primary_code.rationale: This encounter involved significant time addressing depressive symptoms, assessing passive suicidal ideation (psychotherapy component), and performing medication management (dose adjustment of *Sertraline* from 50mg to 100mg). The appropriate primary code relies entirely on the documented total time spent.

output_data.medical_necessity: The session was medically necessary to manage the patient's acute worsening of symptoms, requiring a dose increase of *Sertraline* and critical assessment of passive death ideation associated with *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder* (F33.1).
